title: WHATWG Fullscreen API Workstream-relevant MDN issues
description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by WHATWG Fullscreen API Workstream

items.content_html:

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Document/fullscreenchange_event

What specific section or headline is this issue about?

No response

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

I want to make sure, is there a live example missing from this article, if so, I'd be happy to submit a PR for it

What did you expect to see?

add live example

Do you have any supporting links, references, or citations?

No response

Do you have anything more you want to share?

No response
items.title: [fullscreen] lose live example at fullscreenchange_event

items.content_html:
MDN URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Document/exitFullscreen

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

If you enter in fullscreen mode by using the browsers shortcuts (F11 for example), this simply doesn't work. It doesn't set the fullscreenElement, it remains null.

Specific section or headline?

What did you expect to see?

The functions working as expected even if I switch between calling the fullscreen functions though code or through browser shortcuts.

Did you test this? If so, how?

Yes..
Open the browser, press F11 and check the Document.fullscreenElement, it will be null and it should rather be set.

MDN Content page report details
  • Folder: en-us/web/api/document/exitfullscreen
  • MDN URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Document/exitFullscreen
  • GitHub URL: https://github.com/mdn/content/blob/main/files/en-us/web/api/document/exitfullscreen/index.md
  • Last commit: 89c8199
  • Document last modified: 2022-02-18T09:24:31.000Z
items.title: [fullscreen] Using F11 to enter fullscreen mode doesn’t set fullscreenElement (it remains null) and document.exitFullscreen() doesn’t work
